title: About AYUV Health
content: We're building the future of healthcare through secure, AI-driven, patient-centric health data management. Mission: To empower every individual with complete control over their health data, enabling better healthcare outcomes through unified, secure, and intelligent health record management. Vision: A future where healthcare is preventive, personalized, and accessible to all, powered by secure blockchain technology and cutting-edge AI insights. What Makes AYUV Different: Security (Blockchain-Secured Consent), AI-Powered (Intelligent Health Insights), Unified (Complete Health Picture), Global (International standards, multi-language, cross-system).

title: Features
content: Unified Health Records: Centralize all your medical data from multiple providers in one secure, accessible location. Blockchain Security: Immutable consent management with cryptographic proof of every data access. AI Health Insights: Personalized health recommendations powered by advanced machine learning algorithms. Wearable Integration: Sync data from smartwatches, fitness trackers, and IoT health devices. Smart Notifications: Alerts for medication reminders, appointments, and health milestones. Zero-Trust Architecture: End-to-end encryption with granular access controls and audit trails. Mobile-First Design: Native mobile apps with offline capabilities and real-time synchronization. Global Standards: HL7 FHIR, DICOM compliance. Real-Time Analytics: Live health monitoring with instant insights and trend analysis. Care Team Collaboration: Secure sharing with healthcare providers, family members, and caregivers. Document Management: Organize, categorize, and search through all your health documents and reports. Wellness Tracking: Comprehensive wellness monitoring including mental health and lifestyle factors.

title: Aegis by AYUV Wearables
content: Aegis by AYUV is the world's first Privacy-Native Health OS Wearables featuring: Blockchain-secured health data sync with native consent integration, Federated AI health intelligence for personalized insights, Medical-grade continuous monitoring with clinical precision, Two variants: Aegis Band (athlete-focused) and Aegis Watch (smartwatch functionality), Military-grade durability (MIL-STD 810H), IP68 water resistance, 14+ day battery life, FHIR-compliant integration, Privacy-first architecture, Emergency response features, Offline-first design.

title: Caregiver Module (Patient Portal)
content: Family Dashboard: Multi-generation health tracking and management, emergency contacts, family member details, vital signs, medication status. Comprehensive Health Management: Track and manage health for all family members. Emergency Response: Emergency contacts and response features for families. Alerts Overview: Critical alerts, recent activity, acknowledge alerts for patients. Hospital Dashboard: Patient management, alerts, and communication for hospital caregivers. Eldercare Dashboard: Elderly patient management, family communication groups, WhatsApp integration, privacy-compliant notifications. Multi-Patient Dashboard: Manage and monitor multiple patients, alerts, and health data.
